Package com.orientechnologies.orient.core.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OCredentialInterceptor
    Provides a basic credential interceptor interface.
    OSecurityFactory
    Provides an interface for creating new OSecurity instances.
    OSecuritySystem
    Provides a basic interface for a modular security system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ODefaultCI
    Provides a default credential interceptor that does nothing.
    OSecurityManager  
    OSecuritySharedFactory
    Implements the OSecurityFactory interface for OSecurityShared instances.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OAuditingOperation
    Enumerates the available auditing OAuditingOperation types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OInvalidPasswordException
    An exception for invalid passwords.
    OSecuritySystemException
    OSecuritySystem Exception
